text: Enywe abasuubila, mulabashinga balia bakhaya, mana nibaboola khubashiabwe ngala basamula khushialo nohomba shingala batsia mwiye: â€œBabetsanga hano ninaafu shibakhafwile tawe neshibakhererwe tawe. Kho Nyasaye akhole oko okhuba eshibeela mumioyo chiabu. Ne Nyasaye niye welesinjia obulamu ne niye ufwisinjia. Ne Nyasaye alolanga kamukholanga
